scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attack leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income and age, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop and execute a model inversion attack to extract sensitive customer data from the deployed customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A customer churn prediction model, trained on sensitive customer data (income, age, location, transaction history), is deployed via a public API for use by internal teams. A competitor attempts to use model inversion to extract this data.
